resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108391</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108391</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206165</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cosmology 101</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kosmologie 101</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cosmologie 101</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cosmology 101</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cosmology 101</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοσμολογία 101</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cosmology 101</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a primer on scientific efforts to understand the origin, evolution, and fate of the universe. Among the questions it explores: What types of matter and energy fill the universe? What is the age and shape of the universe? How rapidly is it expanding? The website examines the Big Bang theory, as well as tests and limitations of the theory.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Zündkapsel auf wissenschaftlichen 
Bemühungen, den Ursprung, die Entwicklung und das Schicksal des 
Universums zu verstehen. Unter den Fragen erforscht sie: 
Was schreibt von der Stoff- und Energiefülle das Universum? 
Was ist das Alter und die Form des Universums? Wie schnell
erweitert es? Die Web site überprüft die grosse Knalltheorie, 
sowie Tests und Beschränkungen der Theorie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une amorce sur des efforts scientifiques de 
comprendre l'origine, l'évolution, et le destin de l'univers. 
Parmi les questions elle l'explore : Que tape du 
remplissage de matière et d'énergie l'univers ? Quel est 
l'âge et la forme de l'univers ? Combien rapidement 
augmente-t-il ? Le site Web examine la grande théorie de coup, 
aussi bien que des essais et des limitations de la théorie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um primer em esforços científicos compreender
a origem, a evolução, e o fate do universo. Entre as perguntas
explora: Que datilografa da suficiência da matéria e da 
energia o universo? Que é a idade e a forma do universo? 
Como ràpidamente está expandindo? O Web site examina a 
teoria grande do estrondo, as.well.as testes e limitações da teoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un iniettore sugli sforzi scientifici capire 
l'origine, lo sviluppo ed il destino dell'universo. Fra le 
domande esplora: _ che cosa digit materia e energia materiale di
riempimento universo? Che cosa è l'età e la figura 
dell'universo? Sta espandendosi quanto velocemente? Il Web
site esamina la teoria grande di scoppio, così come le prove e le 
limitazioni della teoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένας εγχυτήρας στις επιστημονικές προσπάθειες 
να γίνει κατανοητή η προέλευση, η εξέλιξη, και η μοίρα του 
κόσμου. Μεταξύ των ερωτήσεων εξερευνά: Ποιοι τύποι 
θεμάτων και ενεργειών γεμίζουν τον κόσμο; Ποια είναι η 
ηλικία και η μορφή του κόσμου; Πόσο γρήγορα επεκτείνεται; 
Ο ιστοχώρος εξετάζει τη θεωρία μεγάλου κτυπήματος, καθώς 
επίσης και τις δοκιμές και τους περιορισμούς της θεωρίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una cartilla en esfuerzos científicos de 
entender el origen, la evolución, y el sino del universo. Entre
las preguntas explora: ¿Qué pulsa de terraplén de la materia y
de la energía el universo? ¿Cuál es la edad y la dimensión de
una variable del universo? ¿Se está ampliando cómo 
rápidamente? El Web site examina la teoría grande de la 
explosión, así como pruebas y limitaciones de la teoría.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206165</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108391</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/cosmology-101</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
